synopsis: In episode #8 of the podcast, hosts Devam and Ahir welcome guest Ganesh Ramakrishnan for an engaging discussion on motivation, personal growth, and the challenges of navigating college life. The trio shares their candid experiences with anxiety, procrastination, and the importance of self-awareness, offering listeners valuable insights and relatable anecdotes.
quotes: Procrastination is not a symptom of laziness; it's an emotional regulation issue.
You are not your thoughts; you are the thing experiencing your thoughts.
Wiggle your toe; sometimes all it takes is a small movement to spark a chain reaction.
If you can't get out of bed, just try to move your finger.
It's okay to need the rest; your body knows when it needs to recover.
When you're anxious, you feel unsafe. Make your friends feel secure.
Don't do something because there's a final goal associated with it; do it for the experience.
Sometimes, making yourself uncomfortable leads to the most growth.
Talk to people about what you want to do; you might be surprised at what interests you.
Remember, it's okay to not know what you want; just focus on what makes you happy today.
